heal_quest_1.name: Healing the Hurt
heal_quest_1.idle_prompt: If only I had more viridian leaves, I could ease so much suffering...
heal_quest_1.talk_prompt: Thank you for asking. My supplies are terribly low. If you could bring me a viridian leaf, I can teach you a basic prayer of healing.
heal_quest_1.reward_message: The priest accepts the viridian leaf gratefully. 'Thank you, traveler. Your spirit is strong. Let me show you how to channel it to restore the body.' You have learned Minor Heal!
heal_quest_1.already_learned_message: The priest smiles. 'Thank you again for your help, traveler. May your light shine bright.'

priest_quest_2.name: A Sturdier Spirit
priest_quest_2.idle_prompt: These poor patrons... they need more than just healing. They need protection. Some ruined pelts would make for good practice dummies...
priest_quest_2.talk_prompt: You've learned to heal, but now you must learn to protect. Bring me 3 ruined pelts so I can demonstrate how to shield the spirit from harm.
priest_quest_2.reward_message: You hand over the ruined pelts. The priest nods, 'Good. Now watch closely...' You learn how to form a Spirit Shield!
priest_quest_2.already_learned_message: The priest nods. 'Your spirit is well protected now.'

shock_quest_1.name: Arcane Components
shock_quest_1.idle_prompt: This research is... lacking! I need components with a strong energetic signature, like a monster claw.
shock_quest_1.talk_prompt: You want to learn? Knowledge is not free. Bring me a monster claw. I need it for my research, and perhaps I'll show you a simple spark.
shock_quest_1.reward_message: The elementalist snatches the claw. 'Good. These have the right energetic signature.' They show you a simple gesture, and you feel a jolt of power. You have learned Minor Shock!
shock_quest_1.already_learned_message: The elementalist nods. 'More claws? I suppose I can take them. Your knowledge is already secure.'

elementalist_quest_2.name: Conductive Materials
elementalist_quest_2.idle_prompt: A simple spark is nothing. To channel true power, one needs... insulators. Ruined pelts are poor, but they will suffice for target practice.
elementalist_quest_2.talk_prompt: That little jolt was just a parlor trick. You want to learn a real spell? Bring me 3 ruined pelts. I will use them to show you what a concentrated blast can do.
elementalist_quest_2.reward_message: You hand the elementalist the ruined pelts. 'Finally.' He sets them up and incinerates them with a powerful jolt. 'That is how it's done.' You have learned Shock!
elementalist_quest_2.already_learned_message: The elementalist seems annoyed. 'I have nothing more to teach you right now.'

trip_quest_1.name: Trip Training
trip_quest_1.idle_prompt: Hmph. Another greenhorn. They walk right past, no situational awareness... they'll be flat on their back before they leave the city gates.
trip_quest_1.talk_prompt: You! You look like you could learn a thing or two about leverage. Wield a proper weapon - a polearm, a staff, something with reach - and I'll show you how to put someone on their back. Once you're ready, try to TRIP me. We'll see if you learn anything.
trip_quest_1.reward_message: This message is not used, the reward is handled in the TRIP verb itself.
trip_quest_1.already_learned_message: The warrior just grunts at you.

innkeeper_quest_1.name: Clearing the Debt
innkeeper_quest_1.idle_prompt: Ah, you're awake. Come see me when you're ready to settle your bill.
innkeeper_quest_1.talk_prompt: Ah, you're awake! About your bill... you can check your WEALTH, but I suspect you're a bit light. No matter. I have an arrangement with the Town Clerk. Take this late 'Lodging Tax' payment to him at the Town Hall. You can use GOTO TOWNHALL. He'll... have more for you to do. Welcome to the city.
innkeeper_quest_1.reward_message: The Town Clerk takes the envelope. 'The Innkeeper's late again... Thank you. Listen, I'm buried in work. Could you run a few more deliveries? First, take this ore requisition to the Blacksmith at the Armory.'
innkeeper_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Innkeeper nods. 'The Clerk tells me you've been a great help. Your debt is clear. Feel free to use the room!'

clerk_quest_1.name: Ore for the Smith
clerk_quest_1.talk_prompt: Have you delivered that ore requisition to the armorer yet?
clerk_quest_1.reward_message: The Blacksmith takes the form. 'Good. I can't make swords without ore. The clerk needs this leather order taken to the Furrier now.'
clerk_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Blacksmith is busy at his forge.

blacksmith_quest_1.name: Leather for the Smith
blacksmith_quest_1.talk_prompt: Did you take that leather order to the furrier?
blacksmith_quest_1.reward_message: The Furrier grunts and takes the order. 'Leather strapping. Fine. Speaking of components, the Apothecary needed this bundle of cured sinew. Take it to her shop.'
blacksmith_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Furrier is busy skinning a pelt.

furrier_quest_1.name: Sinew for the Alchemist
furrier_quest_1.talk_prompt: The apothecary is still waiting for that sinew.
furrier_quest_1.reward_message: The Apothecary smiles. 'Wonderful! Can't brew without a binder. My weekly tithe is also ready. Take this box of salves to the Priest at the Temple. Bless his work.'
furrier_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Apothecary is busy at her workbench.

apothecary_quest_1.name: Salves for the Temple
apothecary_quest_1.talk_prompt: The priest is expecting those salves.
apothecary_quest_1.reward_message: The Priest accepts the box. 'The Apothecary is a kind soul. These will help many. Ah, this also arrived... A new 'mercenary' from the Bound Legion is in town. Please deliver this 'Letter of Welcome' to the Elementalist.'
apothecary_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Priest nods to you in thanks.

priest_quest_errand_1.name: A Chilly Welcome
priest_quest_errand_1.talk_prompt: That letter for the elementalist is important. Best be on your way.
priest_quest_errand_1.reward_message: The Elementalist scoffs at the letter. 'A 'welcome'? Hah. They fear what they can't control. I have no time for this. The city watch needs to know where my 'soldiers' will be. Take this patrol notice to the Guard Captain at the Barracks.'
priest_quest_errand_1.already_learned_message: The Elementalist is busy with his research.

elementalist_quest_errand_1.name: Notice for the Watch
elementalist_quest_errand_1.talk_prompt: Don't keep the Guard Captain waiting for that notice.
elementalist_quest_errand_1.reward_message: The Guard Captain reads the note and sighs. 'Elementals... great. More paperwork. Listen, you're getting to know the town. We need more eyes and ears. Take this recruitment poster to the Librarian at the archives.'
elementalist_quest_errand_1.already_learned_message: The Guard Captain is busy shouting at recruits.

captain_quest_1.name: Poster for the Library
captain_quest_1.talk_prompt: Please get that poster to the library archives.
captain_quest_1.reward_message: The Librarian files the poster. 'More guards... always a need. Now, a small matter. The Theatre Master has several very overdue books on 'Illusory Set Design.' Please retrieve them. Firmly.'
captain_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Librarian is busy cataloging scrolls.

librarian_quest_1.name: The Overdue Books
librarian_quest_1.talk_prompt: The Theatre Master has had those books for too long! Please retrieve them.
librarian_quest_1.reward_message: The Theatre Master sighs dramatically. 'Oh, fine! Here! He has no appreciation for art! Now be a darling and run this final receipt back to the Town Clerk. It proves I've 'returned' his precious books.'
librarian_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Theatre Master is busy rehearsing.

theatre_quest_1.name: The Final Receipt
theatre_quest_1.talk_prompt: That receipt needs to get back to the Town Clerk!
theatre_quest_1.reward_message: The Town Clerk is relieved. 'That's... all of them? Amazing! You've been a huge help. Here is your pay. I'll let the Innkeeper know your debt is clear. You've earned it.'
theatre_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Town Clerk nods. 'Thank you again for your help.'
